name: Carom Billiards (itch)
description: It’s time to put your skills to the test! Grab your friends and play my Carom Billiards game. This game will test your ability to aim with precision, as you try to hit the other balls with the cue ball in as few as possible shots. To score a point, you must strike the red and yellow balls in the same attempt. If you can get three points, that’s the game!
